TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessageQueueInstaller extends System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller

summary.span: 讓您安裝和設定執行應用程式時需要的佇列 (Queue)。

span.span: Allows you to install and configure a queue that your application needs in order to run.

summary.span: 安裝 時，安裝公用程式 (如 InstallUtil.exe) 會呼叫這個類別。

span.span: This class is called by the installation utility, for example, InstallUtil.exe, when installing a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ，安裝公用程式用來寫入與佇列相關聯的登錄值。The is used by the installation utility to write registry values that are associated with the queue. 如需有關安裝公用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。For more information about installation utilities, see [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md). 若要安裝的佇列，建立專案的安裝程式類別繼承自，並設定類別`true`。To install a queue, create a project installer class that inherits from the , and set the for the class to `true`. 在您的專案內建立執行個體中安裝的每個佇列，並新增至您專案的安裝程式類別的執行個體。Within your project, create a instance for each queue in the installation and add the instance to your project installer class. 建立時執行個體，您可以選擇性地傳遞的現有（例如，從測試伺服器） 以建構函式。When creating a instance, you can optionally pass an existing (for example, from a test server) to the constructor. 這種方法會自動提供新佇列的組態設定，藉由鏡像傳入之佇列的設定。This approach automatically provides the configuration settings for the new queue by mirroring the settings of the queue passed in. 或者，您可以手動設定屬性狀態並呼叫預設建構函式的執行個體。Alternatively, you can manually set the properties in the instance to the states you want and call the default constructor. 當呼叫時，安裝公用程式時，它會尋找。When the install utility is called, it looks for the . 如果它是`true`，此公用程式會安裝中的所有佇列專案安裝程式相關聯的集合。If it is `true`, the utility installs all the queues in the collection associated with your project installer. 如果是`false`，此公用程式會忽略專案安裝程式。If is `false`, the utility ignores the project installer. 修改的其他屬性之前或之後加入至執行個體的執行個體專案安裝程式的集合。You modify other properties of a instance either before or after adding the instance to the collection of your project installer. 例如，佇列的安裝公用程式執行之前，必須設定。For example, a queue's must be set before the install utility executes. 一般而言，您未呼叫的方法從您的程式碼; 它們通常稱為只能由 installutil.exe 安裝公用程式。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the installutil.exe installation utility. 此公用程式會自動呼叫期間的安裝程序和呼叫方法如果安裝未擲回例外狀況。The utility automatically calls the method during the installation process and calls if the installation did not throw an exception. 它會出失敗，如有必要，藉由呼叫產生例外狀況物件。It backs out failures, if necessary, by calling for the object that generated the exception. 應用程式的安裝常式會使用專案安裝程式的自動維護已安裝之元件的相關資訊。An application's install routine uses the project installer's to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been installed. 此狀態資訊會持續更新，因為每個公用程式會安裝執行個體。This state information is continuously updated as each instance is installed by the utility. 它通常不需要明確修改的狀態資訊的程式碼。It is not usually necessary for your code to explicitly modify the state information.

span.span: Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 沒有設定任何執行個體屬性。

span.span: Does not set any instance properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Messaging.MessageQueue componentToCopy) cil managed

param.name: componentToCopy
param.span: 元件，其設定決定安裝的新佇列的屬性設定。

span.span: The component whose settings determine the property settings of the new queue installed.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，將安裝設定初始化為現存的 執行個體的安裝設定。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, initializing the installation settings to those of an existing instance.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Authenticate { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Authenticate : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出要安裝的佇列是否只接受已驗證的訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the queue to be installed accepts only authenticated messages.

value.span: 如果佇列只接受驗證過的訊息則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the queue accepts only authenticated messages; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當未經驗證的訊息傳送至只接受已驗證的訊息佇列時，將會拒絕訊息。When a non-authenticated message is sent to a queue that accepts only authenticated messages, the message is rejected. 傳送應用程式可以藉由設定要求的訊息拒絕通知訊息。The sending application can request notification of a message rejection by setting the for the message. 否則，沒有指示，已拒絕訊息，因此除非您將它傳送到寄不出信件佇列，訊息可能會遺失。Otherwise, there is no indication that the message was rejected, so the message can be lost unless you send it to the dead-letter queue.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property short BasePriority { short get(); void set(short value); };
member this.BasePriority : int16 with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定用來在網路上傳送公用 (Public) 佇列訊息的基礎優先權 (Base Priority)。

span.span: Gets or sets the base priority that is used to route a public queue's messages over the network.

value.span: 傳送至公用佇列的所有訊息的單一基礎優先權。

span.span: The single base priority for all messages sent to the public queue.

value.span: 預設為零 (0)。

span.span: The default is zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用於透過網路路由佇列的訊息。The is used for routing the queue's messages over the network. 使用以便傳送至佇列較高或較低的優先順序高於，訊息傳送至其他佇列的訊息。Use the to give the messages sent to the queue a higher or lower priority than that for messages sent to other queues. 設定佇列的基本優先順序時，傳送給它的所有訊息會都提供較高的優先順序比傳送至具有較低的基本優先順序佇列的訊息。When a queue's base priority is set, all the messages sent to it are given a higher priority than that of the messages sent to queues with a lower base priority. 佇列的基礎優先權無效大約的訊息佇列中或從佇列讀取訊息的方式。The queue's base priority has no effect on the order of the messages in the queue or on how messages are read from the queue. 適用於透過網域控制站存取只為公用佇列 （亦即，使用 public 格式名稱）。The applies only to public queues that are accessed through the domain controller (in other words, using the public format name). 私用佇列和直接存取的公用佇列的基本優先順序永遠是零。The base priority of private queues and of directly accessed public queues is always zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Guid Category { Guid get(); void set(Guid value); };
member this.Category : Guid with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定實作 (Implementation) 特定的佇列類型。

span.span: Gets or sets an implementation-specific queue type.

value.span: ，表示佇列的分類 (或 Message Queuing 類型識別項)，可讓應用程式根據使用方式將其佇列分類。

span.span: A that represents the queue category (or Message Queuing type identifier), which allows applications to categorize their queues according to how they are used.

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 佇列分類可讓應用程式相關聯的佇列，根據其使用方式分類。The queue category enables an application to categorize associated queues according to the way they are used. 可以是 null 參考。The can be a null reference. 您也可以定義新的類別。You can also define a new category. 屬性提供的訊息佇列型別識別項屬性，可與特定的佇列相關聯，讀取/寫入存取。The property provides access to the Message Queuing type identifier property, which is associated with a particular queue and is read/write. 您可以使用方法用來建立類別目錄值，保證是唯一的所有值。You can use the method to create a category value that is guaranteed to be unique across all values. 不過，就只需要為不同於其他類別，不會從所有其他類別目錄值值。However, it is necessary only for the category value to be distinct from other categories, not from all other values. 比方說，您可以設定一個群組的佇列{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001}並另一個群組{00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002}。For example, you can set the for one group of queues to {00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001} and the for another group to {00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002}.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Commit(class System.Collections.IDictionary savedState) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Commit (savedState As IDictionary)

span.span: A that contains the post-installation state of the computer.

summary.span: 認可 方法寫入登錄的 安裝資訊，以完成安裝程序。

span.span: Completes the installation process by committing the installation information that the method wrote to the registry.

summary.span: 這個方法是安裝工具所使用的方法，安裝工具會自動呼叫適當的方法。

span.span: This method is meant to be used by installation tools, which automatically call the appropriate methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您未呼叫的方法從您的程式碼; 它們通常稱為只能由 installutil.exe 安裝公用程式。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the installutil.exe installation utility. 此公用程式會自動呼叫安裝程序期間的方法。The utility automatically calls the method during the installation process. 安裝是交易式的所以如果在安裝期間沒有任何安裝專案元件失敗，所有先前安裝的元件會回復為其預先安裝狀態。Installation is transactional, so if there is a failure of any installation project component during the installation, all the previously installed components are rolled back to their pre-installation states. 這可以藉由呼叫每個元件的方法。This is accomplished by calling each component's method. 安裝專案相關聯的所有元件的安裝成功後發生，安裝公用程式的認可安裝。After a successful installation of all the components that are associated with the installation project has occurred, the installation utility commits the installations. 完成安裝的佇列設為適當的初始狀態。 completes the installation of the by setting the queue to the appropriate initial state. 如果所指定的佇列屬性已存在，且包含訊息，清除訊息。If the queue specified by the property already exists and contains messages, clears the messages. 而非，清除訊息，因為清除訊息的動作無法回復。, rather than , clears the messages because the act of purging the messages cannot be rolled back. 應用程式的安裝常式會使用專案安裝程式的自動維護已安裝之元件的相關資訊。An application's install routine uses the project installer's to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been installed. 此狀態資訊，這會傳遞至作為`savedState`參數，會持續更新，當此公用程式會認可每個執行個體。This state information, which is passed to as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the utility commits each instance. 通常，不需要您的程式碼，明確地修改此狀態資訊。Usually, it is not necessary for your code to explicitly modify this state information. 已清除佇列，當張貼至記錄項目`savedState`與安裝相關聯。When the queue has been cleared, posts a log entry to the `savedState` that is associated with the installation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CopyFromComponent(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub CopyFromComponent (component As IComponent)

span.span: A to use as a template for the .

summary.span: 為訊息佇列複製安裝時需要的 元件的屬性值。

span.span: Copies the property values of a component that are required at install time for a message queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您未呼叫的方法從您的程式碼; 它們通常稱為只能由 installutil.exe 安裝公用程式。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the installutil.exe installation utility. 可由安裝公用程式來設定的屬性值的值，將現有的。 is used by the installation utility to set the property values for the to the values of an existing . 如果的也就是傳入為空字串 ("")，您必須設定屬性設為非空白值，安裝程式執行之前。If the of the that is passed in is an empty string (""), you must set the property to a non-empty value before the installer executes.

exception.span: 與這個 相關的元件不是 。

span.span: The component associated with this is not a .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::EncryptionRequired EncryptionRequired { System::Messaging::EncryptionRequired get(); void set(System::Messaging::EncryptionRequired value); };
member this.EncryptionRequired : System.Messaging.EncryptionRequired with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出佇列是否只接受私用或加密的訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the queue accepts only private, or encrypted, messages.

value.span: 其中一個 值，指出傳送至佇列的訊息所需的加密 (Encryption) 層級。

span.span: One of the values that indicates the encryption level required on messages sent to the queue.

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加密指定時，只有加密的訊息。When encryption is specified, only the of a message is encrypted. 其他屬性，例如，不會加密。Other properties, such as the , are not encrypted.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Install(class System.Collections.IDictionary stateSaver) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Install (stateSaver As IDictionary)

param.name: stateSaver
param.span: ，用於儲存執行認可、復原或解除安裝作業所需的資訊。

span.span: A used to save information needed to perform a commit, rollback, or uninstall operation.

summary.span: 執行安裝，並將訊息佇列資訊寫入至登錄。

span.span: Performs the installation and writes message queue information to the registry.

summary.span: 這個方法是安裝工具所使用的方法，安裝工具會自動呼叫適當的方法。

span.span: This method is meant to be used by installation tools, which automatically call the appropriate methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法將訊息佇列資訊寫入至登錄，並將相關聯執行個體的佇列，位於所指定的路徑與屬性。The method writes message queue information to the registry, and associates the instance with a queue that is located at the path specified by the property. 如果佇列不存在，建立異動式佇列。If the queue does not already exist, creates a transactional queue. 設定新的或現有的佇列屬性中所指定的。 sets the new or existing queue properties to those that you have specified in the . 如果佇列已經存在，其屬性會重設的。If the queue already exists, its properties are reset to those of the . 如果現有的佇列不是交易式，您必須刪除並再重新建立為異動式佇列。If the existing queue is not transactional, it is deleted and then recreated as a transactional queue. > [!CAUTION] > 如果需要重新建立佇列，佇列中的訊息將會遺失。If it is necessary to recreate the queue, messages in the queue will be lost. 一般而言，您未呼叫的方法從您的程式碼; 它們通常稱為只能由 installutil.exe 安裝公用程式。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the installutil.exe installation utility. 此公用程式會自動呼叫方法，在安裝過程中撰寫與安裝訊息佇列相關聯之登錄資訊。The utility automatically calls the method during the installation process to write registry information that is associated with the message queue being installed. 安裝是交易式的所以如果在安裝期間沒有任何安裝專案元件失敗，所有先前安裝的元件會回復為其預先安裝狀態。Installation is transactional, so if there is a failure of any installation project component during the installation, all the previously installed components are rolled back to their pre-installation states. 這可以藉由呼叫每個元件的方法。This is accomplished by calling each component's method. 安裝專案相關聯的所有元件的安裝成功後發生，安裝公用程式的認可安裝。After a successful installation of all the components that are associated with the installation project has occurred, the installation utility commits the installations. 完成安裝的佇列設為適當的初始狀態。 completes the installation of the by setting the queue to the appropriate initial state. 如果所指定的佇列屬性已存在，且包含訊息，清除訊息。If the queue specified by the property already exists and contains messages, clears the messages. 而非，清除訊息，因為清除訊息的動作無法回復。, rather than , clears the messages because the act of purging the messages cannot be rolled back. 應用程式的安裝常式會使用專案安裝程式的自動維護已安裝之元件的相關資訊。An application's install routine uses the project installer's to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been installed. 此狀態資訊，這會傳遞至作為`stateSaver`參數，會持續更新，因為此公用程式會安裝每個執行個體。This state information, which is passed to as the `stateSaver` parameter, is continuously updated as the utility installs each instance. 通常，不需要您的程式碼，明確地修改此狀態資訊。Usually, it is not necessary for your code to explicitly modify this state information.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsEquivalentInstaller(class System.Configuration.Install.ComponentInstaller otherInstaller) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsEquivalentInstaller (otherInstaller As ComponentInstaller) As Boolean

span.span: The installer to compare.

summary.span: 決定指定的安裝程式是否能夠處理與這個安裝程式相同的安裝。

span.span: Determines whether the specified installer can handle the same kind of installation as this installer.

returns.span: 如果這個安裝程式和 參數指定的安裝程式能夠處理相同的安裝，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this installer and the installer specified by the parameter can handle the same kind of installation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常會傳回`true`只有此安裝程式並安裝程式所指定`otherInstaller`參數都相同的類型。Typically, returns `true` only if this installer and the installer specified by the `otherInstaller` parameter are of the same type.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Label { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Label : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定佇列的描述。

span.span: Gets or sets a description of the queue.

value.span: 標籤，描述訊息佇列。

span.span: The label that describes the message queue.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性不需要是唯一的佇列。The property does not need to be unique across queues.

span.span: The is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaximumJournalSize { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.MaximumJournalSize : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定與佇列相關的日誌的最大值。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size of the journal that is associated with the queue.

value.span: 日誌佇列的最大值 (以 KB 計)，日誌記錄的是從佇列移除的訊息。

span.span: The maximum size, in kilobytes, of the journal queue, which records messages that are removed from the queue.

value.span: 訊息佇列的預設值是沒有限制。

span.span: The Message Queuing default is no limit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立佇列時，訊息佇列會自動建立佇列日誌中新的佇列與相同的位置。When a queue is created, Message Queuing automatically creates a queue journal in the same location as the new queue. 佇列日誌來追蹤從佇列中移除的訊息。The queue journal is used to track the messages that are removed from the queue. 兩種類型的訊息不會受到追蹤： 因為其接收時間計時器到期時，會從佇列中移除，以及從佇列中清除。Two types of messages remain untracked: those that are removed from the queue because their time-to-be-received timer expired, and those that are purged from the queue. 應用程式無法傳送訊息至日誌佇列。Applications cannot send messages to the journal queue. 不過，您必須定期清除佇列，以便移除不再需要的訊息。However, you must periodically clear the queue to remove the messages that are no longer needed. 計算儲存在日誌佇列至為佇列所在的電腦配額的訊息。Messages stored in journal queues count toward the quota for the computer where the queues reside. （由系統管理員會設定電腦配額）。(The computer quota is set by the administrator.)

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long MaximumQueueSize { long get(); void set(long value); };
member this.MaximumQueueSize : int64 with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定佇列的最大值。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size of the queue.

value.span: 佇列的最大值 (以 KB 計)。

span.span: The maximum size, in kilobytes, of the queue.

value.span: 訊息佇列的預設值是沒有限制。

span.span: The Message Queuing default is no limit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然它可以重設之後，佇列大小上限通常會在佇列建立時設定。The maximum queue size is typically set at the time of queue creation, although it can be reset later.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MulticastAddress { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MulticastAddress : string with get, set

summary.span: 在 MSMQ 3.0 中介紹。

span.span: Introduced in MSMQ 3.0.

summary.span: 取得或設定與佇列相關聯的多點傳送位址。

span.span: Gets or sets the multicast address associated with the queue.

Docs.value:
，包含有效的多點傳送位址 (在下面所示的表單中)，否則為 ，表示佇列未與多點傳送位址相關聯。A that contains a valid multicast address (in the form shown below) or , which indicates that the queue is not associated with a multicast address.
``` <address>:<port> ```

span.span: MSMQ 3.0 is not installed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Path : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定這個物件參考的佇列的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location of the queue that is referenced by this object.

value.span: 路徑，表示佇列在網路中的位置。

span.span: The path that represents the location of the queue in the network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 語法屬性取決於佇列類型它的參考。The syntax for the property depends on the type of queue it references. 下表顯示的語法，您應該使用的各種類型的佇列。The following table shows the syntax you should use for queues of various types. |佇列類型Queue type|語法Syntax| |----------------|------------| |公用佇列Public queue|`machineName`\\`queueName`| |私用佇列Private queue|`machineName`\\`Private$`\\`queueName`| |日誌佇列Journal queue|`machineName`\\`queueName`\\`Journal$`| |電腦日誌佇列Machine journal queue|`machineName`\\`Journal$`| |機器無法投遞的信件佇列Machine dead-letter queue|`machineName`\\`Deadletter$`| |電腦交易式寄不出信件佇列Machine transactional dead-letter queue|`machineName`\\`XactDeadletter$`| 使用 」。 「 本機電腦。Use "." for the local computer. 您也可以使用或的訊息佇列應用程式物件來描述為佇列路徑。You can also use the or of a Message Queuing application object to describe the queue path. 下表顯示每種類型的參考正確的語法。The following table shows the proper syntax for each type of reference. |參考資料Reference|語法Syntax| |---------------|------------| |格式名稱Format name|FormatName: [*格式名稱*]FormatName:[ *format name* ]| |標籤Label|Label:[ *label* ]Label:[ *label* ]| 如果您離線工作，您必須使用格式名稱來定義佇列。If you are working offline, you must use the format name to define the queue . 如果您不這樣做，應用程式會擲回例外狀況，因為主要網域控制站，所以無法解析成。If you do not, the application will throw an exception, because the primary domain controller is unavailable to resolve the into the .

exception.span: 設為無效值，可能因為語法無效。

span.span: The was set to an invalid value, possibly because the syntax is not valid.
-or-
The is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Messaging::AccessControlList ^ Permissions { System::Messaging::AccessControlList ^ get(); void set(System::Messaging::AccessControlList ^ value); };
member this.Permissions : System.Messaging.AccessControlList with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定與佇列相關的使用權限。

span.span: Gets or sets permissions associated with the queue.

value.span: ，包含一或多個存取控制項目，指定信任項和要授與佇列的使用權限。

span.span: A that contains one or more access control entries that specify the trustees and permissions to grant for the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，公用或私用佇列的建立者擁有完整控制權，而每個人都有取得佇列屬性，取得權限，並寫入至佇列的權限的網域群組。By default, the creator of a public or private queue has full control, and the domain group Everyone has permission to get queue properties, get permissions, and write to the queue. 訊息佇列依序存取每個權限的清單項目，直到它找到適用於目前的使用者和目前嘗試的動作。Message Queuing accesses each permission list entry in turn until it finds one that applies to the current user and the current attempted action. 作業系統權限明確拒絕使用者的權限採用的優先順序高於允許。As with the operating system permissions, the rights that you specifically deny to a user take precedence over those you allow. 當您建構屬性，加入執行個體您集合。When you construct the property, add instances to your collection. 當您建構每個存取控制項目時，您可以指定一般或標準存取權限。When you construct each access control entry, you can specify generic or standard access rights. 佇列的權限可以是下列任何組合：The rights to a queue can be any combination of the following: - 刪除Delete - 讀取安全性Read Security - 寫入安全性Write Security - 同步處理Synchronize - 修改擁有者Modify Owner - 讀取Read - WriteWrite - 執行Execute - 必要Required - 全部All - 無None 這些權限，您可以結合使用的位元 OR 的位元旗標的一組：These rights are a set of bit flags that you can combine using the bitwise OR: - 完全控制Full Control - 刪除訊息Delete Message - 接收訊息Receive Message - 查看訊息Peek Message - 接收日誌訊息Receive Journal Message - 取得佇列屬性Get Queue Properties - 設定佇列屬性Set Queue Properties - 取得權限Get Permissions - 設定權限Set Permissions - 取得佇列的擁有權Take Queue Ownership - 寫入訊息Write Message

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Rollback(class System.Collections.IDictionary savedState) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Rollback (savedState As IDictionary)

span.span: A that contains the pre-installation state of the computer.

summary.span: 將電腦還原到安裝之前的狀態，方法是復原安裝程式寫入登錄的佇列資訊。

span.span: Restores the computer to the state it was in before the installation, by rolling back the queue information that the installation procedure wrote to the registry.

summary.span: 這個方法是安裝工具所使用的方法，安裝工具會自動呼叫適當的方法。

span.span: This method is meant to be used by installation tools, which automatically call the appropriate methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的影響復原的方法。The method undoes the effects of the method. 如果在安裝專案中的任何元件的安裝失敗時，呼叫。 is called if the installation of any component in the installation project fails. 方法建立或設定佇列的屬性。The method creates or sets the properties for a queue. 刪除佇列，或是預先存在的佇列的屬性重設為其預先安裝值。 either deletes the queue or resets the properties of a pre-existing queue to their pre-installation values. 一般而言，您未呼叫的方法從您的程式碼; 它們通常稱為只能由 InstallUtil.exe 安裝公用程式。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the InstallUtil.exe installation utility. 此公用程式會自動呼叫方法之後安裝失敗復原任何變更，安裝程序已完成。The utility automatically calls the method after an installation failure to undo any changes that the installation process has already made. 應用程式的安裝常式會使用專案安裝程式的自動維護已安裝之元件的相關資訊。An application's install routine uses the project installer's to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been installed. 此狀態資訊，這會傳遞至作為`savedState`參數，會持續更新，因為此公用程式會彙備份執行個體。This state information, which is passed to as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the utility rolls back each instance. 通常，不需要您的程式碼，明確地修改此狀態資訊。Usually, it is not necessary for your code to explicitly modify this state information.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Transactional { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Transactional : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出佇列是否只接受做為交易的一部分傳送的訊息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the queue accepts only messages sent as part of a transaction.

value.span: 如果佇列只接受做為交易的一部分傳送的訊息，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the queue can only accept messages sent as part of a transaction; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從本機交易式佇列使用或不使用交易，就可以擷取訊息。Messages can be retrieved from a local transaction queue with or without using a transaction. 如果您未指定在交易內容，訊息佇列為您建立單一的內部交易。If you do not specify a transaction context, Message Queuing creates a single internal transaction for you.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Uninstall(class System.Collections.IDictionary savedState) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Uninstall (savedState As IDictionary)

span.span: A that contains the post-installation state of the computer.

summary.span: 藉由從登錄移除佇列資訊來移除安裝。

span.span: Removes an installation by removing queue information from the registry.

summary.span: 這個方法是解除安裝工具所使用的方法，解除安裝工具會自動呼叫適當的方法。

span.span: This method is meant to be used by uninstallation tools, which automatically call the appropriate methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已`Remove`，也會刪除相關聯的佇列。If the is `Remove`, also deletes the queue associated with the . 一般而言，您未呼叫的方法從您的程式碼; 它們通常稱為只能由 InstallUtil.exe 安裝公用程式 （如果您在解除安裝模式）。Typically, you do not call the methods of the from within your code; they are generally called only by the InstallUtil.exe installation utility (in uninstall mode). 此公用程式會自動呼叫方法來還原系統的組件安裝到預先安裝的狀態所影響。The utility automatically calls the method to restore the parts of the system that were affected by the installation to their pre-installation states. 這包括刪除已解除安裝 MessageQueue 與建立關聯的登錄資訊。This includes deleting registry information that is associated with the MessageQueue being uninstalled. 應用程式的解除安裝常式會使用專案安裝程式的自動維護已解除安裝元件的相關資訊。An application's uninstall routine uses the project installer's to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been uninstalled. 此狀態資訊，這會傳遞至作為`savedState`參數，會持續更新，因為此公用程式會解除安裝每個執行個體。This state information, which is passed to as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the utility uninstalls each instance. 通常，不需要您的程式碼，明確地修改此狀態資訊。Usually, it is not necessary for your code to explicitly modify this state information.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Configuration::Install::UninstallAction UninstallAction { System::Configuration::Install::UninstallAction get(); void set(System::Configuration::Install::UninstallAction value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出安裝程式在解除安裝期間如何處理佇列：移除、還原至預先安裝狀態或維持其目前的安裝狀態。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates what the installer does with the queue at uninstall time: remove it, restore it to its pre-installation state, or leave it in its current installed state.

value.span: 其中一個 值，指出解除安裝 時，要讓佇列保持什麼狀態。

span.span: One of the values that indicates what state to leave the queue in when the is uninstalled.

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您安裝佇列時，您可以選擇使用現有的佇列。When you install a queue, you can optionally use an existing queue. 如果您這樣做，您必須決定佇列應該還原為預先安裝的狀態，或保留在其目前的後續安裝狀態。If you do so, you must decide whether the queue should return to its pre-installation state, or remain in its current, post-installation state. 如果您選擇還原為預先安裝的狀態佇列，不會還原已從佇列中刪除在安裝期間的訊息。If you elect to return the queue to its pre-installation state, messages that were deleted from the queue at install time are not restored. 您可以重設只佇列相關聯的屬性為其預先安裝的值。You can reset only queue properties that are associated with the to their pre-installation values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseJournalQueue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseJournalQueue : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否複製從佇列擷取的訊息至相關聯的日誌佇列。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether messages that are retrieved from the queue are also copied to the associated journal queue.

value.span: 表示複製從佇列擷取的訊息至日誌佇列，否則為 。

span.span: to copy messages that are retrieved from the queue to the journal queue; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 日誌佇列，可讓您持續追蹤的訊息，即使它們已從佇列擷取。A journal queue lets you keep track of messages even after they have been retrieved from the queue. 不過，兩種類型的訊息不會受到追蹤： 當其接收時間計時器到期時，會從佇列中移除，以及從佇列中清除。However, two types of messages remain untracked: those that are removed from the queue when their time-to-be-received timer expires, and those that are purged from the queue. 日誌佇列應該定期清除，以移除不再需要的訊息。A journal queue should be cleared periodically to remove messages that are no longer needed. 訊息儲存在日誌佇列都算是日誌所在之電腦的配額。Messages stored in the journal queue count toward the quota for the computer on which the journal is located.
